Build: 1.0.4

Os: Windows 8 64bit, Nvidia GeForce GTX 770, 16gb ram

Problem: So every time I've removed the airbrakes from the Brake action group, double and triple checked in the VAB. But when I get on the airstrip the airbrakes respond to the brake hotkey and button.

Additionally the airbrakes will not stay in any action group one sets.

Edited June 23, 2015 by locustgate
Yeah it's a known issue, the brakes have a line in the cfg that sets them to the brakes key, also only toggle is broke in the action groups, extend and retract work okay.

Also (as with the other thread)...If you aren't opposed to add-ons, there's a fix for it here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97285-0-25-Stock-Bug-Fix-Modules

Cheers,

~Claw
Supporting this one too even if probably not prior at all. tend to be real anoying and giggles related as playtime goes.
